ygData.subject: RE: Question about bard armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, here s the answer...Yes other classes especially KS ing casters and Kiting Druids will want them.  Bet the warrior s are now laughing. Darkwood Staff:
ygData.messageBody:
Well, here's the answer...Yes other classes especially KS'ing casters and
Kiting Druids will want them. Bet the warrior's are now laughing.

Darkwood Staff: Romar Sunto will give you a darkwook staff, also known as
the Staff of Ro, which is useable by all classes, if you bring him a Lambent
Stone from a Hill Giant, a Sand Giant or a Griffin.

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 3:35 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Question about bard armor quests


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

Having read the spoilers about the new bard quests on the test server, I'm
wondering if we will have to compete with other classes for the components
to complete these quests? For example, we need lambent stones for each of
the armor pieces. Will other classes also need lambent stones for their
armor quests or are the components they need completely different than ours?
The same question applies to the special loot items we need. I hope that
each class has their own unique components required for their quest. You
would assume that if lambent armor is bard only then only bards have a need
for lambent stones. However, everyone knows that you can't assume anything
when it comes to EQ. Can anyone provide confirmation on this?

Galtin of E'ci

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
